channel.title: Home on NetWithAlex
channel.description: Recent content in Home on NetWithAlex

item.title: Control Policies vs Data Policies in Cisco SD-WAN: Key Differences
item.description: Learn the key differences between Cisco SD-WAN control and data policies, when to use each, and how they impact routing and traffic forwarding

item.title: Getting Started with SD-WAN Automation
item.description: Learn the fundamentals of SD-WAN automation and how to get started with scripting and APIs to streamline your network operations.

item.title: AppQoe Series: Packet Duplication
item.description: Learn how Packet Duplication can help you reliably transmit critical traffic over unreliable transports to making sure your application.

item.title: AppQoe Series: Forward Error Correction (FEC)
item.description: Learn how Forward Error Correction (FEC) works in Cisco SD-WAN to improve application performance over lossy links. Explore use cases, configuration insights, and testing results.

item.title: Cisco SD-WAN On-Prem ZTP: Automating Router Onboarding
item.description: Plug and Play (PnP) lets you onboard SD-WAN devices automatically via Cisco Cloud. This post explains how to achieve zero-touch provisioning (ZTP) in an airgapped, on-premises environment.

item.title: AppQoe Series: TCP Optimization
item.description: Discover how SD-WAN enhances TCP performance. Learn about key optimization techniques that improve application reliability and user experience.

item.title: Securing the Edge with Cisco SD-WAN and Secure Access
item.description: Discover how Cisco SD-WAN and Cisco Secure Access work together to enhance network performance and security in an internet first world.

item.title: Enhanced Application Aware Routing
item.description: Learn the benefits of enhanced app aware routing and how to implement it on your network

item.title: Improving my SD-WAN Assistant - Multiple agents
item.description: Learn how an LLM agentic approach can be used to troubleshoot your SD-WAN network

item.title: Building my first SD-WAN AI Assistant with LangChain
item.description: Discover how LLMs can be integrated with Cisco SD-WAN to troubleshoot your network in a simple and stress-free way

item.title: Tracking SD-WAN incidents with Service Now
item.description: Learn how to integrate Cisco SD-WAN with ServiceNow and automate your incident management

item.title: A New Chapter: SD-Routing's Revolution in Network Management
item.description: Explore how SD-Routing can simply and effectively help you manage and monitor your WAN network.

item.title: Simplifying AAR: 3/3 Fallback to best path
item.description: Learn how AAR can help improve the application user experience with Cisco SD-WAN

item.title: Simplifying AAR: 2/3 Understanding different scenarios
item.description: Learn how AAR can help improve the application user experience with Cisco SD-WAN

item.title: Simplifying AAR: 1/3 The Foundations
item.description: Learn how AAR can help improve the application user experience with Cisco SD-WAN

item.title: Cisco SD-WAN Network Wide Path Insights (NWPI)
item.description: Learn how to use the most advanced troubleshooting tool for your Cisco SD-WAN Network.

item.title: About me.
item.description:
Hello! I'm Alex, and I love sharing my knowledge about networking and technology. I have been on the networking field for the past years.

Currently contributing my expertise at Cisco, where I started at the front lines of R&S TAC Team, after a couple of years, I transitioned to SD-WAN TAC Team.

Currently, I'm a Customer Success Specialist for Enterprise technologies, particularly DNA Center and SD-WAN. I earned my CCIE Enterprise on 2022. I am also interested in automation, AI and technology in general.

Thanks for being here. Hope you find my blog useful and entertaining. Let's connect! ðŸ‘‡
